item.title: Introduction to Docker
item.description: Introduction to Docker Docker is a powerful platform for developing, shipping, and running applications. By using Docker, you can quickly deploy and scale applications into any environment and be assured your code will run. Why Docker? Docker simplifies the deployment process and makes it easier to manage applications. The use of Docker containers ensures that an application works seamlessly in any environment. Key Benefits Consistency Across Environments: Docker containers provide consistency across different development, testing, and production environments.
